globals.notLoggedInMsg: You are not logged in your BibNext account. Login {{openTag}}here{{closeTag}}
globals.errorLoginMsgNoLink: Your login information appears to be outdated. Please login at BibNext.com

bg-citation-import.maximumLimitReached: The maximum limit of citations that you can add may have been reached.
bg-citation-import.errorAdding: There was an error adding a citation.
bg-citation-import.checkingFailed: Cannot verify if this citation exists

cnt-citation-import.notAuthorized: Please log in through the BibNext website
cnt-citation-import.directImport: Direct importation to BibNext is supported

query.activeNotExists: The currently active project does not exist. Visit $1here$2 to double check all your projects
query.cannotReceiveResource: Cannot retrieve resources from the web server. The server is temporarily down or an error occured
query.unexpectedError: An unexpected error has occured. Please try to sign out and sign in on BibNext and restart your browser.

generators.noCitationsFound: No citations were found in the document. Please insert some citations first.

menu.searchInProject: Search in your associated project for citations
menu.suggestedAdded: Suggested citations were added in your text. For convenience, they can be identified using the following: {{temp}}
menu.noSuggested: No suitable locations for in-text citation recommendations were found
menu.keyTip: Use {{openTag}}Up{{closeTag}} and {{openTag}}Down{{closeTag}} arrows to navigate, {{openTag}}Enter{{closeTag}} to select a citation
menu.supportedLanguages: Supported languages: English, Chinese, and Spanish
menu.addTwoOrMore: You can add two or more citations by searching again
menu.alreadyIncluded: Citation is already included in the list
menu.selectAnOption: Select an option from the list above
menu.selectTheDropdown: Select the dropdown box, hit {{openTag}}backspace{{closeTag}} and type to search a bibliography style.
menu.noRelevantCitations: No relevant citations found or project contains no citations.
menu.clickToAdd: Click here to add more citations
menu.createMore: You can create more projects on {{openTag}}BibNext{{closeTag}}
menu.noProjectMsg: You have not set an associated project for this document. Please set a project from the BibNext menu.
menu.modifiedCitationMsg: You have modified this citation manually so we won't automatically update it when reference style is updated. If you want to change this behavior, please check the menu BibNext -> Edit citation
menu.pressToEdit: Press {{openTag}}Ctrl + M{{closeTag}} to edit the citation.
menu.literatureReviewNote: This menu allows you to generate a literature review based on your project citations. Not all citations are used but the most important. Also, citations need to have an abstract for this to be effective.
menu.literatureReviewParaphraseNote: Alters the original text that is extracted from the paper so that it won't be exactly like the original. Warning: Increases compilation time.
menu.litReviewFailed: Something went wrong. Make sure that there is enough papers that contain abstracts in your project.

google-docs.authDecline: BibNext cannot work with Google Docs without the authorization. Please authorize BibNext to access Google Docs first
google-docs.authPromptMsg: You will be prompted to authorize BibNext to access Google Docs
google-docs.notDocX: No doc or docx documents are supported in Google Docs. Use File -> Save as Google Docs in order to use BibNext in your document.

overleaf.clickToCreate: Click "Create" to add all your references in a bib file. You can refresh that file to render updates if you make any changes to your in-text citations

word.ourBrowserSupports: Our browser extension supports one-click reference importation. Install our extension {{openTag}}here{{closeTag}}

lit-review.literatureReviewDesc: We identified the following topics of research related to our work which we itemize further below:

delayer.takingABitLonger: Your query is taking a bit longer to complete due to Google Scholar restrictions. Estimated time is {{count}} second
delayer.takingABitLonger_plural: Your query is taking a bit longer to complete due to Google Scholar restrictions. Estimated time is {{count}} seconds.

LanguageSelector.thisWillReload: This action will reload the current browser tab to take effect

recommendation.newReference: You have new reference recommendations for your project!
recommendation.newInsight: You have new venue insights for your project!

forms.toBegin: To begin using BibNext, please review the following information.
forms.BibNextNeeds: BibNext needs access to your browser tabs to import and recommend citations
forms.BibNextUses: BibNext also uses technical and device data to prevent fraud and to customize the product for you. This includes cookies that are used to authenticate you, personal data such as your email address, your browser information, and your IP address.
forms.shareMsg: Share anonymous usage data with BibNext. To make the product better for you and other users, we collect data on which BibNext features you use. This includes data such as which BibNext features {{openTag}}and websites{{closeTag}} you use with BibNext.
forms.byInstalling: By installing the extension you agree to BibNext's {{openTag}}Terms and Conditions{{closeTag}} and acknowledge that you have read BibNext's {{openTag1}}Privacy Policy{{closeTag}} and {{openTag2}}Cookie Policy{{closeTag}}
forms.aFewThings: A few things in case you have not used BibNext for a while.
forms.login: You need to log into {{openTag}}BibNext.com{{closeTag}} before you can use BibNext
forms.premiumMsg: When you visit academic sites supported by BibNext Extension, notifications will appear to guide you on the available functions and features. Make sure to checkout our {{openTag}}premium features{{closeTag}} for more information

popup.loggedIn: You are logged in and have access to all our premium features
popup.goPremiumMsg: Go premium to unlock the following:
popup.loginToUnlock: Login now to unlock the following:
popup.anote2: Easy referencing for Google Docs, Overleaf and Word
